modName: Skyrim LOW END PC mod (CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT)
summary: I am attempting to make Elder Scrolls Skyrim for low end pcs, i will try to remove unnecessary textures etc. This mod is in progress and im doing this in my spare time, so dont expect much from me. I will keep on updating this page, and i hope to succeed. Thank you all for reading!
descriptionHtml:
[b]                                     SKYRIM LOW END PC mod
[/b]Hello there, everyone! In the next weeks/months i will be attempting to make Skyrim a more low end pc game, less bugs, higher fps rates.
I am hoping to do this by simply removing or editing unnecessary textures, fixing bugs, removing unnecessary animations, removing water animations.
 This mod is in progress and im doing this in my spare time, so dont expect much from me. I will keep on updating this page, and i hope to succeed. Thank you all for reading!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
This mod is developed only by me, (Kristaps 112) and im not planning on taking any content from other mods and if i will 
it will be with the authors acceptation.
Thank you all for reading, and i will try to work on this mod. More information in the next 7 days.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
 


                                                                      [u]  [/u][b][u]CURRENT  FEATURES [/u]
[/b]                                                      
                                                             - slightly increased frame rate
                                                             - some minor bugs fixed
                                                             - i have fixed some minor bugs in which quest objectives can get stuck
    


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------>
                                                   
     I have removed many unnecessary things starting from trees to places you cant even access. I want to get some things done, and make more progress, and i am planning on doing a showcase of what i have done so far and sharing more information in the next 7 days. Thank you for reading! :)
author: Kristapz
